website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for monitoring body fat and other data that helps users keep track of their fitness goals.
pros: Has a lot of nice features for a low price, including the capability to measure 13 body compositions and Bluetooth connectivity
App is easy to set up and navigate
cons: Occasional inaccuracies reported, but it gets measurements right most of the time

customer_reviews.title: Love this scale!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale!! The app is awesome! I purchased a scale from Walmart that cost $50! I hated the app it only told you weight and BMI and the dashboard was an ad!! I promptly took it back!! This scale tells you so much more for half the cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail akins

customer_reviews.title: Compared to InBody Scan results. Super close.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this scale for a few months now and have always felt that the results were pretty accurate based on results I’ve been told from my trainer. I mainly got this scale to track my body fat percentage. My gym recently got one of the Inbody Scan machines that run around $8k and my trainers can’t believe how close the numbers of my scale are to the ones the inbody gave. For reference of accuracy: weight- scale is 187.2 inbody was 187 BMI- scale 26.2 inbody 26.1 Body fat %- scale 20.7% inbody 19.9% BMR- scale 1825 inbody 1838
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very useful digital weighing scale
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing digital weighing scale!! It’s compact and light and can be slid under almost anywhere. Setup and connecting it to the app was super easy. All the info calculated and shown on the app are pretty accurate. I really advise to choose athlete mode on the app setup only if you workout more than 4 days a week. I love this scale and I’m looking forward to shed those extra pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Vegito_Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great Aid for My Fat Loss Journey
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these scales since the day they arrived as part of my weight loss journey. They integrate well with my mobile phone with no hiccups whatsoever. I am still unclear if I should use ATHLETE mode vs NORMAL mode though. Small issue. App-wise, can be improved: 1. Have a remarks box after the measurement to allow user remarks or comments. For example, if I just drank 500 ml of water before weighing, I could put that in the comments to explain my spike in weight. 2. Under the Trends > Month view, allow a rotating function on the phone so the graph does not look so compressed. See attached. Overall, great value for money. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ephy

customer_reviews.title: Great scale at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeds expectations. Best scale I’ve ever had. Great app that updates Fitbit and MyFitnessPal. It’s really great to be able to tell how hydrated I am from the app and where a few pounds of weight gain is coming from- muscle vs fat.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyvirtigo

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale and smaller than I expected. It easy to connect to your Bluetooth and has a lot of great features you can use to track your progress. When used with your Bluetooth, the scale will show you your BMI, percentages of fat, water, lean muscle, bone, etc., and even your metabolic age. Idk how close the numbers are, but the weight is only about 2 ounces off from my other scale... and sometimes it’s the same
customer_reviews.author: Chaos

customer_reviews.title: A lot cooler than the scale at the Doctors office
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical ordering this scale because of the "extras" included in the diagnostics. The accuracy of the scale seems to be pretty decent when compared to the scale at the doctors office. Keep in mind that the body fat % displayed uses BIA and has a pretty large margin of error.. It still allows for good body fat management as you can see fluctuations in the % displayed. The only problem I've had was the initial set up of linking the scale to my phone, however, once it linked it has been fine since.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Schoen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. It was very simple to set up and the corresponding app was free to download. Within minutes of unpacking I had this scale and my account set up with no problems. One thing I noticed in other reviews is the mention of the scales small size. I wear a women's size 8 shoe and the footprint of this scale is fairly small so anyone with a large foot may find it small for them. It is perfect for my foot size and perfect in the small space I need it to fit in so this was actually a bonus for me. At only $26.00 I feel like I got a lot of bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: L Morton

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This scale is terrible. Every morning when I would weigh myself it would tell me 3-5 different weights and is incredibly inaccurate. This scale is a huge waste of money and is not worth buying it. Save yourself the time and money
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Eckert

customer_reviews.title: They Are Watching You...
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely no reason a scale needs to be able to track phone calls, app use, location, files, etc. Without the app, you can not access any of the other measurements, just weight. I will be getting a different scale that hopefully will not be tracking my every move.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Kumquat

customer_reviews.title: The scale was never able to connect to my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: The scale was never able to connect to my phone. I tried other numerous devices to make sure it wasn't my phone, but it would never sync regardless of the phone or tablet that I tried. I called the "customer support" line (which always went to voicemail) and left a message, but 2 days later still no call back.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E Rieser III

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Very good quality!My wife and I use it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Edison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and eaccurate and just step on
customer_reviews.text: Incredible scale for the money. It was easy to set up and connect to iPhone app and is accurate as far as I can tell. No touch first and wait. You just step on which is nice. Super inexpensive but better than other more expensive scales I’ve tried. Light weight and I feel like I could break it but it handles weight just fine.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: This scale only lasted 3 months! We replaced the batteries the other day and it worked for the first day of the new batteries then started showing error messages. We replaced the batteries again and it wouldn’t even turn on. The price is great but it really should get you longer than 3 months use!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Herzing

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to my weight loss journey!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item and immediately got it set up- super simple to get started! I was amazed at all of the measurements and functions of the app. It is just as good, if not better, than the super expensive versions. Extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaD

customer_reviews.title: In the trash - Get a different scale
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this scale right off the bat but already threw away the packaging so I couldn't return it. It is too small for my feet to fit on the scale without hanging off. I have size 11 women's feet. My husband's feet are much larger and really don't fit at all. Then I couldn't figure out how to get it to do body composition without the app that has horrible reviews. Then, less than 3months of use and the battery is dying. update - 1 year later and 3 sets of batteries later - it will not turn on at all even with new batteries and is in the trash
customer_reviews.author: I am SDB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my scale. It is so convenient. The app it comes with is amazing. It records everything I want like BMI, muscle mass, water weight... And so on. Since I'm in the midst of a weight loss journey this have proved so beneficial to me. I could not have chosen a better scale. It provides trends and graphs and the minute you step on the scale and it gets your weight, it transfers that information through Bluetooth to your phone. I don't have to manually input ANYTHING. While I might not always love the numbers that appear, I for sure will always love this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best scale I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this scale! Not only does it show me measurements on everything I can possible think of, it is compact and accurate. I love that I can see my results instantly on my phone without having to write anything down. This scale has really helped to motivate me in my weightloss journey. I really like that it works off of double A batteries instead of those coin size batteries (whatever you call them). There is no need to tap it to turn it on and wight for it to go to zero before stepping on. You just step on it and within seconds it gives you your weight. I would highly recommend it to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After having this scale for 6 months.... the scale makes your weight jump 10lb to 5lbs to 30lbs even everytime I step on it. My Boyfriend stepped on it and the numbers went from 275 to 370 when he weighs 200 pounds.. now it’s saying Err on it.... beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage...
customer_reviews.text: This scale is incredibly inaccurate in multiple ways. First of all, i dont even believe there is any sort of sensor in the scale to check water weight, body fat percentage, etc. It gives you the same results as a estimate calculator on a website would. The results are not your personal results at all. Second, bluetooth often takes many many tries before it syncs. Lastly, even the weight factor is in accurate. At first it was fine. Now (less than a month later) i can "gain" or "lose" 3-7 pounds just by stepping off and back on. I would return this and demand a refund if i werent a hassle for me to do so. *Dont buy*
customer_reviews.author: TLC Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Invasive Privacy Agreement
customer_reviews.text: The scale is great, but the application monitors ALL of your data to include phone calls. The application will not provide the detailed information (Fat content/water weight/etc) without these permissions. Really shady how deep they hide this data collection Also, be cautious of placement of the scale. I have seen variations of the measured weight to be 3lbs simply due to the surface of the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Batteries that come with died within 5 days -- UPDATE 11/14/2018
customer_reviews.text: Scale works fine, the batteries that come with the scale died within a few days. So, if you try to use it after a few days, just change the batteries. -- Update 10/18: The batteries die too fast with the scale. I have changed the batteries 3x within a month. I do like the scale, but it goes through batteries too fast. November 2018 Update: This scale is horrible! I have gone through 3 sets of batteries in less than a month. Do not buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: APP permissions were WAY to many... it's a scale!
customer_reviews.text: App states"we enjoy using your personal information". It's a scale with an APP... I knew that but the personal information it required and the intrusive permissions were unnecessary for a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fluctuates, inaccurate - returned
customer_reviews.text: The scale is sleek and pretty, but fluctuates. At first, it read over 3 pounds heavier than our current scale, then after several weighings, it came down. Day two: reading high again. In a time period of about 6 hours, it showed my body fat percentage decreased 10%. (Yes, the scale was on a flat surface and my feet where clean and dry.) Returned...I just don’t need to wonder is it’s actsully accurate every day.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Scale is smaller than feet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small scale. My women’s size 9 foot barely fits. The sale was 10 pounds off (higher) the app that comes with scale has a 3 star rating. I read reviews before purchasing. This is a small inaccurate scale. My son who is 6’4 size 12 shoe cannot for his feet on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennywren

customer_reviews.title: Crazy BMI measures
customer_reviews.text: I'm dying. 😂 I got on the scale and had a mini heart attack when it said my BMI was 33. So I call in my husband. This guy works out everyday sometimes twice a day. He rides dirtbikes and for fun. He's active duty in the United States Army and overall fit af. This thing said his BMI was 31!! I dunno 1 man with a 6 pack with an over 30 BMI. Returning this tomorrow. 10/10 would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: MichiokoXIII

customer_reviews.title: Body Fat Reader is Far From Accurate. Boo.
customer_reviews.text: The scale is accurate on weight analysis. You can add profiles for different members of your family. The company also gives you a discount on other product purchases. I question the accuracy on the body fat measurements. I have a long way to go to get to athletic. The scale even indicates that I’m ‘obese’ due to my BMI. The body fat reading has stayed reading that I have athletic levels. Can an obese person really have low body fat? All in all, because that is so off, I question the validity of all the other readings it gives (except for weight - it reads the same as my other scales).
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mom

customer_reviews.title: A 2-year Disposable Full Body Scale
customer_reviews.text: Worked great initially but the functions will cease to function within 2-years. Purchased in July 2018. The body measurement functions with the exception of the weight stopped working in March 2020. Its basically a disposable scale that you'll need to replace every two years. $25 every two years for a full body function scale can be a bargain in the eyes of some, especially in today's low price, low quality, disposable life style. Not for me. It seems these scales are branded as different manufacturers but are basically the same. They use similar apps.
customer_reviews.author: Westside Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate for muscle mass and other non-straight body weight measurements
customer_reviews.text: At first I really loved this device because I was seeing my trends changing, but over time as my weight fluctuated up and down I noticed that all of the other body readings were the same based on my weight. That means that no matter how much weight lifting I was doing and muscle development my muscle percentages were the same because my weight it’s self was the same. I don’t think any of the data coming from it beyond the actual body weight is worth anything. I’m gonna keep the scale because I think it weighs my actual weight correctly but everything else is bull. Not recommended for anything other than actual body weight. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is horrendous and disappointing. I've been using it for roughly 7 months, updating my trainer and feeling terrible about myself for not meeting my goals. The scale has read 160lbs since June, despite my diet change, increased workout schedule, and lifestyle change. After a trip to the ER, I found out my actual weight is 144lbs! A few days after leaving the ER I checked my weight on an old fashion scale at the gym and it also read 144lbs. Even though I'm happy to know my hard work has paid off, I am furious that I made this purchase and that I've been giving my online trainer the wrong info for three months. DON'T BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope there is a warranty it’s dead
customer_reviews.text: Oh I am so bummed out, I bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas and it lasted for months and died it’s not batteries the whole thing is just dead Is there any warranty? Four months is not an acceptable life span for a bathroom scale, how embarrassing it was a gift and it’s dead already
customer_reviews.author: Pam Silleman

customer_reviews.title: How the scale ACTUALLY works
customer_reviews.text: Great how it hooks to your phone but it’s doesnt actually gather the body fat data, etc from you. It’s using algorithms. You can see this by first installing using athlete mode, the uninstall (I used a different email to set it up again) then put it under non athlete mode. I got drastically different body fat, water content, etc results but the weight remaind the same (weight is accurate)
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working- Great, Fast customer response!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this scale. It completely stopped working on 8/25/20....first use was 6/19/20. If support works with me, I will modify my rating....If not-buyer beware. I am the only one who has used it and weigh 140 lbs, so weight wasn't the issue....it just stopped working. Update 8/27/20. How wonderful is this company! Not even two days later...and they are sending me a replacement. Very fast response, positive interaction, and on year warranty granted without any hoops. I can't live without this scale....great gift idea, get one for yourself too!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Deyoung

customer_reviews.title: Worst App Ever (even can not create an account)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale by looking at the high ratings. However, it is nothing but a failure. I installed the app on my phone. It is requiring me to create an account but It just keeps giving server bussy error. In the manual, it gives some directions (seems it is a very common problem), I followed exactly what it says, the issue is the same. It seems they already know the problem instead of fixing they give workaround which DOES NOT WORK. If you want to use this device just for scale, go ahead and buy. If you want all the functionalities, then stay away. This is a total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Orhan

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: **Update** I had to return the scale because the app never uploaded which defeated the purpose of buying it. So far- not impressed. It’s been challenging trying to download the app. That was the whole purpose of my purchase. I’m going to try a few more times before requesting to return it. I don’t need another basic scale. I download other apps with ease, and deleted apps I haven’t used in awhile just to make sure it wasn’t a space issue. I’ll update the review once there’s an ending to all this.
customer_reviews.author: Venus McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Never a problem. Helped me lose weight!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a scale with an app I have never heard of but I was pleasantly surprised. The scale itself is just like any other fancy glass scale. The four circles on the scale measure your body fat and water intake and other things of that sort. I was really happy with how easy it is to use. I don't even think about it anymore. My boyfriend has a profile on my app as well so he can track his weight. I don't even have to have the app open for the information to sync. Truly a smart scale. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Claribel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Scale stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The weight measurements seemed to have worked fine for 4 months, but the unit no longer powers on. The unit stopped working after 4 months- and it seems as there's no warranty. The amazon link for warranty information says to see the seller's page-- but there's no contact information there. I would not recommend purchasing this item, as mine resulted in an early failure. Otherwise- it seemed like a fine scale. The main downside (outside of it now being non-functional) was that the phone was required to have the app open during use, to transfer information from the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about accuracy since I didn't have another scale to compare. But I am one of those who was frustrated because everyone kept saying "wow you look like you lost a lot" and the scale number never changed. With this I see why now with the breakdown of where the weight is. I can focus on continuing my healthy changes and seeing an outcome because either my weight will decrease or my muscle mass will increase and percentage body fat decrease. Either way it greatly reduced my frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4-5 months
customer_reviews.text: This scale worked great originally - the app was very easy and recorded lots of data, information synched easily to smart phone, and it has a sleek look. However, after having it for about 4-5 months, the battery screen just flashes that the batteries are low. We have replaced the batteries multiple times, and it has not been fixed. **UPDATE** The company reached out to me directly and refunded the purchase. They also offered to send a new scale. This was great service and responsiveness, even though the product itself did not meet my needs. Perhaps the one that we received was defective, and with the great service, wanted to update this review!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great for those who are conscience of data privacy
customer_reviews.text: The scale is great and easy to use. My favorite aspect is that the mobile app can be limited so that no data is stored except on your device. When you download the mobile app, you can disagree with the terms, which means the data will only be stored on your device, not on some server where your data can be used for any purpose. If you have an iPhone, you can still choose to have the data written to your Health app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, but Ideal Metabolic Age Statement Appears to Be Without Merit
customer_reviews.text: I like this item, but I take issue with the statement that the ideal metabolic age is two thirds of the biological age. I find no support for this contention anywhere on the internet. The consensus is that the metabolic age should be equal to or less than the biological age, but two thirds seems ridiculous!!!. I walk between 15,000 and 20,000 steps per day. I’m a vegetarian, and I eat a very healthy diet. My BMI is 23.5. I was very disappointed at first, to learn that my metabolic age was only two years less than my biological age. After doing my research, I feel much better about my fitness level.
customer_reviews.author: John Foley

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Will really help keep you motivated !
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy to install the app- all I had to do was open up the app on my phone , set my phone down next to me and step on the scale and than in a flash I get all the stats and it saves the data . It’s so exciting to step on scale and see how everything from my bmi , body fat percentage and weight has gone down and muscle mass increasing . This is so affordable and soooo much better than just having a scale that doesn’t track anything other than your weight. Get rid of the old and in w the new tech- won’t disappoint !
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bluetooth Integration
customer_reviews.text: The app / smartphone integration works so well with this scale, I actually looked forward to weighing myself -- kinda! :) While I don't think that weight alone can track the accuracy of multiple measures that well, seeing everything in one place with graphs is nice. And you can set goals that allow you to track your progress. I also like the integration with Apple Health so that it adds to other health information that I have on my phone. Some smart scales can be abnormally expensive but I found this to have a great price-point and do everything that I needed it to do & more.
customer_reviews.author: EMM

customer_reviews.title: Body fat incorrect
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t calculate body fat right. I had my trainer at the gym measure me and it was 11% more.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Smart

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, Not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this scale after seeing reviews that it was actually accurate. After going to the doctors and discovering I’d hit my highest weight, I decided to get healthy and workout, and with that I wanted a new scale that could track my body mass, muscle mass, body fat %, etc. while I am the same weight, I have significantly less body fat and more muscle mass, yet the scale shows it as the same. And that my BMI is recorded as obese. Quite disappointed. Seems it only calculates the rest of the measurements based solely on your weight and height.
customer_reviews.author: Eryn

customer_reviews.title: Most motivating scale ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this scale. I have never been motivated to lose weight before until I got this scale, and so far I’m 15lbs down!! It’s really exciting to weigh myself every day because I like to see how everything changes. I don’t know how accurate all of the measurements are, Ive seen some reviews say that it’s all pre-calculated according to your weight and height at the time but I don’t believe that because I’ve stayed the same weight and still seen other measurements fluctuate. My sister recommended this scale to me, and so far I have also gotten my dad and sister in law one as well as recommended it to countless people
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Iv realized this doesn't actually measure your body fat or muscle accurately. I started weighting myself everyday and my weight will fluctuate which is normal but this scale tells me my body fat and muscle is also fluctuating which isn't true. Im pretty sure it just guesses based on whatever weight you are at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the positive reviews!
customer_reviews.text: When I got the packAge the box was torn. The scale says something different each time that I have used it ! I am so disappointed being that I seen a lot of good reviews! Definitely a waste of my money !!!
customer_reviews.author: whitney peake

customer_reviews.title: Readings incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: When my info went into my phone it is not reading the body fat correctly at all! I’m 5’2” , 136 lbs, 34 years old and it’s telling me my body fat is at 19% which is equivalent to an athlete. Hell, my body fat wasn’t that low when I was in the best shape of my adult life! I can’t figure out how to fix it. It’s frustrating because this feature is what I bought it for. May return if I can’t get customer service to help me. **for the pic included- I did it again after eating dinner to show my husband so obviously I weigh more than I did that morning but just to show you...
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than a month of light use!
customer_reviews.text: This scale stopped working after less than a month after first use. I tried new batteries, etc, and I still get an ERR every time I step on it. Amazon reached out to the seller for assistance but I still haven't heard back. I was hoping to not have to leave a negative review, but here I am. No rough use, just one person stepping on the scale every day or every other day, for less than a month
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Robin

customer_reviews.title: feckin noice for athletes/ppl w eating disorders
customer_reviews.text: The app is mad decent for the price and if you click on your different body composition variables (e.g. click on “visceral fat” it shows a breakdown of whats healthy/unhealthy based on your height/weight data). I bought this so I could flirt with that line of being “underweight/unhealthy” without actually being at risk. As a surfer I wanted to have the least amount of body fat whilst retaining my muscle mass so that feature was important to me. (Work smarter not harder right?) Pretty accurate readings just make sure you touch all the nodes and don’t forget to whip it off after use. *I am NOT promoting eating disorders I’m just being real with my own struggles*
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Scale!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is really cool with the app and connectivity! It connects to Samsung S Health. I put 5 stars for accuracy although I'm not exactly sure how accurate it is. I have a decent scale that weighs to the tenth. This scale consistently weighs me .6 more than my other scale and weighs my husband 1 lb more than the other scale. Of course, I prefer to think that the older scale is the more accurate one ;)! But, I do love all of the different measurements that it gives me. The price is fabulous as well! Definitely a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Gump

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous. My husband and I both use this scale. Either one of us can step on this scale and later in the day open the app which will ask whether the weight reading belongs to you or someone else in the household. The metrics are all recorded so you can keep track of how your body is changing. The metrics are, of course, estimates based on the height, age, and age your input during set up. But you can input other measurements, ie. waist circumference, after set up (which I didn’t realize until weeks later) and I feel that it adds to the accuracy of the metrics.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok, but not more than that
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars on accuracy, because I just dont have any way to determine how accurate it is. I gave the mobile ap 3 because there's very little info on how the ap is supposed to work. When I emailed the company, on a question, the reply was within a day, but there explanation was difficult to understand, and I was actually not able to figure out what I needed to do. Shame as this could be great, but so far not greatly impressed. It works fine, just not any better. I wish the ap would interface with Noom, which it doesnt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid scale, connected to app (with some effort)
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to have gotten this scale. I like the way it connects to an app, so I don't have to keep my weights in my head; this helps me avoid the crazy I have usually gotten with daily weighing. It seems to be pretty accurate, based on my weights at the doctors' offices. The fact that I need to be barefoot discourages me from multiple daily weighings, since I wear socks routinely. So, it seems to be pretty accurate, and the tech discourages my crazy, so that's good! It also speaks somewhat to my Fitbit. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: CissaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Scale Reading for Water and Fat Percentage!
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate scale reading. I bought this because of the mostly good reviews but was sadly disappointed. I was drinking 8oz+ of water a day and somehow was still gaining water weight.After 2 weeks of trusting the data given to me, I decided to do something I should have done the first time I bought it, test it. I weighed myself before drinking water. After drinking 36oz of water, my fat percentage sky rocketed and my water percentage slightly decreased.. Before testing this out, I thought something was wrong with my body and was about to seek medical attention. I am sure glad that it was the scale and not me!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: So much more insightful than a plain old scale!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how much information this scale tracks!!!! I never even knew about some of the metrics it tracks! The information in the app is so detailed with help in interpreting the values it displays. I have learned a lot more about my body and how to properly take care of it since buying this scale. ALSO it makes me feel a lot better about the fluctuations in my weight because I can look closely into what is driving that. I LOVE THIS SCALE! It has helped me so much mentally and physically! AND it wasn't even more expensive than a plain old digital bathroom scale. I see no reason NOT to buy this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Meghana Raja

customer_reviews.title: love this body scale!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome body scale! It connects to the app very easily via bluetooth. After connected once it automatically recognizes my device when I step on it. The pairing process was very easy. The app provides all of the results, and displays them statistically and graphically. I compared it to my friends bluetooth scale and the results were nearly identical! I have had this scale for 2 years and it is still working great, and never had any problems. Definitely a good bang for your buck, and will help keep you on track with your fitness goals.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Good Scale, good mobile app!
customer_reviews.text: Great compact scale. To be honest, having a glass scale makes me a little bit nervous, but it seems solid enough! The directions say to take the batteries out after each use. I guess I will eventually find out why it says that when it blows up or something, from me not taking the batteries out. The mobile app is incredibly user friendly. The app syncs well with other health applications on my iPhone, which is convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: App needs a lot of work (at least for iphone)
customer_reviews.text: The app does not work. I have been talking to the support desk for FitIndex and have installed the app 3 times. Have checked my bluetooth connections over and over and could not get my iphone to recognize the Fitindex to read all the metrics. The scale worked to show my body weight just fine.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: The best scale ever! Finally!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is so comfortable to stand on, I have large feet and some scales feel too small! This one is perfect. The app syncs up seamlessly. I just open the app on my phone, set it on my bathroom counter, step on the scale, and the cute music the app plays lets me know when the scale has completed its assessment. The options within the app to measure, compare and set goals for my health is WONDERFUL! I love being able to track my progress and have the insight to set realistic goals in a way that isn’t overwhelming. I have already recommended this scale to all my friends and family. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: accurate and precise, when it works
customer_reviews.text: I've had a water immersion scan that closely matched the output of this scale (the water test said I was slightly leaner than what this scale reported). The scale is very repeatable when I measure myself multiple times, but the scale does depend on being on a hard surface like porcelain tile. The big problem that I have with this scale, is that eventually the biometrics fail (after about a year). I clean my feet, the contacts on the scale, and adjust how I line up my feet -- nothing works, it refuses to do any of those measurements. It is functional only for weight now
customer_reviews.author: Josh S

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family and i to track get healthy. After setting eveyone up with a profile i weighted it. The device stopped registering. It would flip through the number but never register on the app. I spent over an hour troubleshooting with zero results. To much trouble with no solution. So other points... the area surface is very small. I have a size 12 foot and the tips of my toes were over. I am returning this after 1 weight in
customer_reviews.author: erik wallimann

customer_reviews.title: 4 great months until it broke
customer_reviews.text: The scale broke after 4 months - It doesn't show any measurement and flashing "Low" instead. I've reset the scale and changed the batteries a few time but it didn't work. When it used to work, it was a great product. The app had to be open to sync with the scale over bluetooth, and the scale measurements were accurate. $25 dollars for 4 months is very expensive...
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Very good inexpensive scale for all the details it reads
customer_reviews.text: I feel this scale is really accurate. It breaks down everything and with being a personal trainer I like to know where I stand on visceral fat, body fat%, water, muscle, etc. My numbers are very close to the InBody scans and I scan about once per month at my gym. I highly recommend especially for the price. Very similar to an InBody scan but way cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: How cool!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know there were scales that could read bioelectric impedance! And for just about the cost of a scale! This one felt very sturdy, expensive, and well made. I am so impressed. I was pretty disappointed that I have to download an app in order to get all the readings, especially the body fat.. but it seemed like most bioelectric scales were doing the same app thing.. so I bought it and I really love it! I do have to have the app open in order to get it to read anything other than weight so that sucks. But I really really love it other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale nearly a month and am happy with it so far. It doesn't take up much space, gives accurate readings, and tracks -- with the app -- lots of useful information like body water percentage, body fat percentage, and metabolic age. It connects nearly instantly with my iPhone as long as I make sure to have bluetooth turned on and the app open. You do need to be careful to step exactly on the metal markings with both feet for the extra data beyond weight to register. I wear a 7.5 shoe and the scale "fits" me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and cute scale
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool scale. I love how there’s an app for me to keep track of my weights and identify trends. I got the white and I think it looks very sleek and modern looking. It’s like an almost translucent-frosted white look. So not like an actual white. The material is like a glass feel. I’m very satisfied with this scale and have no complaints so far. And for the price too, it’s way better and more high-tech than scales I’ve seen at other stores for about the same price! Would highly recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG REGRET. do not buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Although everything I wrote was entirely true; they sent me a new one free of charge BUT it still doesn’t work. Kudos to them for having great customer service. No matter what batteries I put into it it dies right away. The batteries It came with didn’t even work. In a attempt to get it to work , I bought about 4 different brands of batteries and no matter how I put them in it doesn’t stay alive for more than 30 seconds. It’s such a waste of money I wish I could return it or somehow be refunded. Absolutely saddening.
customer_reviews.author: Aqsa

customer_reviews.title: good scale for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good scale for the price. It's behavior will degrade strangely with low battery -- you need to replace the cheap batteries it comes with. The other nit is that it strives for consistency with its recent reading -- so e.g. if you weigh yourself, and then remove clothing and weigh yourself again, it will "lie" to deliver a consistent reading (if you then wait a few minutes, it'll give you its true reading). This also means that if you step onto the scale too quickly (thus 'bouncing' onto the scale with extra weight), the reading will initially show as too high. You need to gingerly step onto it to get your correct weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin Peretz

customer_reviews.title: Synchs with phone but ran out of batteries
customer_reviews.text: Really nice scale. Attractive and small. Really cool that the phone connects easily to the app and automatically fills in lots of unique details like fat %, bone density, metabolic age, etc. the bummer of that you actually have to have your phone with you and the app opened for it to synch... so it’s not THAT much easier than inputting it manually, although you get allll the details when it’s synced to phone. Update: so annoying, stopped working After a few months. Probably just batteries running out but my last scale worked for 8 years and still didn’t run out of batteries
customer_reviews.author: MelWend

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm pretty satisfied with this purchase. When I first started using it, I got a few different readings in one weighing session, but now it seems to have leveled out. Seems pretty on-par with my gym scale, which is the "more professional" kind. I can't really speak to the body fat and other readings. I think it uses a combination of weak bioelectrical impedance and probably statistical height weight and BMI info. I know that more sophisticated BIA scales even have a margin of error so that doesn't really bother me. What I really love is that this scale and app syncs with my Noom app, which requires me to weigh in daily. Super convenient!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaG

customer_reviews.title: Use It As a Normal Scale Or Use The App For More Info
customer_reviews.text: When we got this, we immediately set it up and downloaded the app. To my surprise, it was super easy to setup. Every time I step on the scale, I open the app and hold it in my hand. It tells me my weight, then it makes a pinging sound and records it on my phone. I like being able to look and see my weight, body fat percentage, etc. It's actually made tracking my weight so much easier and really keeps me focus. I'd recommend this product to anyone. Use it as a normal scale, or use the app and get more information. It's your choice!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this! So much more than a "scale".
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this scale. The musical prompts/responses to the results make weigh ins fun. Super informative and I love that the app shows trends so I don't have any extra work to keep up with how I'm doing. I keep telling people about this. What a gem. I keep up with so many important metrics and it's the same price as the simple scale I was using which means it's an exceptional value (to me). The weight # was the same from the old scale to this one, down to the decimal point, so I felt 100% comfortable making the switch from my trusty scale of more than 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I love it
customer_reviews.text: The only reason i'd mark it 4 stars is because they're using an equation with your weight and the age/gender/height info you entered to calculate all those things in the app, not like its truly measuring your "bone mass" etc but still super cool and looks slick in my bathroom <3
customer_reviews.author: Alexis G

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scale. The only thing that I had to learn the hard way was that you have to have the scale on a flat and HARD surface. When I weighed myself on my hard wood floor my readings were lower than when i weighed myself on my garage or tiled bathroom floor (which was actually my accurate weight). I love the logging and the graph; it helps me see my progress, which helps me keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pretty! It works well for the weight
customer_reviews.text: The scale is thin, light and sleek, very pretty! It works well for the weight, it actually matched up to my doctors scale! However it will not give me any of the other information. I must be doing something wrong. On the other hand it could be the fact that I only have one leg. I have a hard time balancing and standing still on it. I think I will keep it though and see if it continues to give me an accurate weight. I only feel a little gipped, it could just be my fault for being an amputee!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Haskell

customer_reviews.title: I returned this scale
customer_reviews.text: First it wasn't substantial. I felt like it was going to break when I stepped on it for the first time. Second, the scale was not even close to being accurate. I bought the scale to help track my planned weigh loss (28 BMI). The scale via the app said my body weight was 20%. NEVER..... The upside- the scale is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Precise and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this scale is clean, sleek, and straightforward. Each time you step on the scale, you receive up to 11 different pieces of information about your body composition. Though most of the measurements are correlated with one another and their accuracy remains unclear -- I haven't independently verified things like BMR or bone mass -- they are extraordinarily precise. Collecting and analyzing the data on the mobile app could not be easier, and there are useful visualization tools to track progress/trends over time. Overall, it's an affordable, visually appealing scale that allows you to measure and track trends in your physical health with a high degree of precision.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this scale in July 2018. It worked perfectly, syncing seamlessly with Apple Health with no accuracy issues. It recently stopped reading the biometric data, only providing weight and BMI. I attempted all of the troubleshooting steps (wetting feet, changing batteries) with no success. I was ready to purchase a new one but I emailed the company to see if there was anything else I could do. They replaced my scale with a new one, no questions asked! It’s refreshing to see a company stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  Very nice scale with newest features.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love this scale. So far, It is everything it said it would be. It works well. I needed to keep the cost down, so this was a great value. This is not a cheaply made scale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale and it’s extremely easy to connect it to the app. It’s small and lightweight which is what I love about it. Another great thing is that my husband can use it too by switching profiles. The only thing that is a little frustrating is that you have to have the app open and ready to go before weighing versus it just sending the data to the app automatically, although I’m sure that’s to be expected with a Bluetooth connection. I’m looking forward to seeing these graphs change long term!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea F

customer_reviews.title: Wow, so affordable and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I get a quick doctors visit every time I use it. And I cannot believe how affordable it is. But it does seem to be a bit of a fragile device. I keep it stored in it's box rather than on the bathroom floor where guests might step on it with shoes. You have to use it on a hard surface with bare feet to get all of the measurements. There are metal electrodes. I have had my BMI taken at the doctors office as well as all of the other measurements it provides. So far it seems to match the doctor results just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Caldreaming

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the #on scale :(
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the Bluetooth or App mostly due to the fact I don’t need to see that high number twice and then haunting me in the phone or God forbid someone see it on my phone! I would love this scale much more if when I stepped on it the number was much lower! Is that so much to ask? lol great scale otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great accurate scales—almost same weight as doc scales!
customer_reviews.text: These scales are awesome! They are not very expensive at $26 & they tell you so much about your body. I like that it syncs with your phone, produces a spreadsheet of all the information it collects & lets you save it to a note on your phone. You can email it and it comes in an Excel spreadsheet format. I’d like to see a mini travel version. One problem I noted was date & time column adds 3 extra misc letters that I have to manually delete. I also have to adjust spacing to get all info on one page in landscape format.
customer_reviews.author: Andronike K. Seamans

customer_reviews.title: great, except..
customer_reviews.text: I love the features it has and the fact that it has an app for the device to connect to and send/keep all your records of everything. you can even make multiple profiles onto it so it saves the record for the right person. however, one thing I noticed on this is that it drains batteries REALLY FAST. I don't even use them a lot and use it once in a while, but after I use it like.. less than 10 times, it's out of battery and I need to replace them (why I took off a star). Which is kind of mind blowing for me. It's weird. But i still like it the scale and the app itself.
customer_reviews.author: Shareshares

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked this scale and app for the time that they were working. Obviously measurements were not "that" accurate. I compared them to caliper estimations, but it was a good way to generalize a trend. My scale stopped working after 6 months, replaced the batteries, tried to reset it... nothing. This is not a replacement piece I was planning on purchasing twice a year. Very disappointed. I would not recommend this scale, spend a few more bucks and get something that is more reliable and will last.
customer_reviews.author: JinnyBee

customer_reviews.title: Suits our Needs
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this scale. Came highly recommended to me by friend at gym. Are all the numbers 100% accurate I'm guessing not. However, as long as the BMI, body fat ,visceral fat and muscle mass are heading in the right direction you know you're making progress. I can tell you the weight is spot on as I work in doctors office and have compaired its reading to my calibrated scales. Great customer service too. Our first one came defective didn't sit flush the manufacturer replaced immediately with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: sierragrl

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This scale has an amazing large amount of information it gathers from my foot-print. The app (android) was easy to locate and install. Pairing the scale to my phone was easy, and, as long as the app is open, every time I use the scale, the reading are recorded. Note: 1) The app needs to be open to record. 2) You have to wait to the scale to finish doing its stuff before getting off it. After the weight reading is stabilized, the scale will show a sequence of lights from left to right a couple of time, then you will hear the phone chime that it has been received.
customer_reviews.author: Seriously

customer_reviews.title: Nice app, solid hardware
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any issues connecting the app or bluetooth -- it's not that difficult, people! The weighing itself seems to be accurate, though I don't pay much attention to the additional figures as I am highly skeptical that they are anything more than algorithmic calculations. Note that these figures aren't fulfilled unless you are shoeless/sockless. I'm not clear if weighing without the additional figures (wearing socks) get logged. It does seem that the app averages multiple weighings in a single day to a median weight for that day. I do wish you could weigh in without having the app open, but I read reviews that said as much before purchasing. Hard to beat this price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas_mm

customer_reviews.title: Truly helping us stay on track.
customer_reviews.text: I've lost 7 lbs since purchasing this scale. Having the scale sync with my other Health apps has been essential in staying on track. This scale is fun for my kids, "Mom, I'm going to weigh myself open the app!" They like watching their weight go up! (ha!) My husband keeps track of his on his phone, so we can still keep somethings secret ;) i encourage you to purchase yourself this wonderful scale. PS - I did a body scan at Crossfit and this scale was 99% accurate with the $$$$ one at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Just Browsing

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this scale
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. For not a ton of money, this scale and its related app really do a great job at tracking my overall health. I had been using an analog scale for years and could never really get an accurate read, and I'm so glad I made the jump to digital, and even happier about the body composition info that's included with the app (which is free, by the way). Super easy to use, looks good (though I wouldn't say this is "white" - it has a light blue/green tinge to it), and has a slim form. I'm excited to more accurately track my weight and health and highly recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: KPMT

customer_reviews.title: Second chance was TOTALLY worth it!
customer_reviews.text: **long past due update** So this company has such wonderful service! Without my requesting it AT ALL they sent me a replacement scale. Which was fantastic to begin with. But I wanted to give it a true trial and see how it held up in comparison to the last one. Let me tell you, I am NOT disappointed. Thank you guys for allowing me to give your scale a second chance! This scale was great until it broke and won’t tyrn on not even 2 months later. Changed the batteries, but it still won’t power up.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this scale since May 2018, it worked well for me in the beginning, then my weight started vary 5-10 lbs day to day. It’s become inaccurate and frustrating to use. I used my mom’s scale to see what my weight would be and it’s 9lbs lower from what my scale has been reading.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy M

customer_reviews.title: Preferred my old scale
customer_reviews.text: I like that this scale is so smart and can track multiple things through the app that my old scale couldn’t. But this scale does not beep once it’s done measuring you, and does display the info on the scale’s screen, only your weight. Everything else you must use the app to view. I prefer my scale to view, and my app to track. I also do t like the red lights for the small display it does show. Other than these small things. It’s a nice scale. But I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, very detailed scale!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best scale i have ever experienced. The digital numbers are easily readable and very bright and pleasing to read. The app it requires you to download is super easy and intuitive. Just load up the app, create a profile and step on the scale with your phone in hand and you get instant results on body fat %, protein content, BMI, muscle mass, water content, BMR etc... So many factors of health are displayed. The tracking software is very intuitive, it tracks your new measurements every time you step on the scale and shows your progress, whether it's day by day or week by week. I'm very pleased with this scale at the price offered.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Scale broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this scale nearly everyday for the last few months. Pros: Scale seemed pretty accurate within about a pound Bluetooth functionality worked to connect it to the app without issue Cons: Scale broke after 6 months, bad quality No way of exporting or transferring stored data. The only way is to have the fitindex app already synced to another app like google fit before weighing yourself. If you use the scale a lot before linking to google fit, none of the data can be transferred.
customer_reviews.author: thefost

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Cheap, Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This scale was so easy to set up and use that it makes FitBit's scale look stupid in comparison. I just had to get rid of my VERY expensive FitBit scale after only having it for 3 years. This little scale came with batteries, set up in about 10 seconds and according to the info I have from my doctor appointment yesterday, it's extremely accurate. Time will tell on it's durability, but for $25 bucks, if I have to replace it in 3 years, I'll be happy to head back here and buy another. VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Accurate
customer_reviews.text: With most other scales, I have to weigh myself 3 times and go with the number that populates the most. This scale is absolutely consistent. When I weigh myself 3 times, it repeatedly states the same result. It's easy to use, understand, and all the information is right at your fingertips. You can check your current measurements, track your trends, compare your results with your goals... I've used this scale for almost a year and have had zero problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Did not work within one month of purchase
customer_reviews.text: This scale stopped working very soon after my purchase. I tried replacing batteries, and it still does not work. Better products on the market than this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

product_meta.title: FITINDEX Bluetooth Body Fat Scale, Smart Wireless BMI Bathroom Weight Scale Body Composition Monitor Health Analyzer with Smartphone App for Body Weight, Fat, Water, BMI, BMR, Muscle Mass - White
feature_bullets: Sync with fitness app - smart scale with easy operation, download "FITINDEX" APP through apple store or google play, sync with APPLE Health, GOOGLE Fit, FITBIT APP, Samsung Health and offers App for Apple Watch, keep you and your family healthy.

13 body composition measuring functions - use bio-electrical Impedance Analysis (BIA) technology. Wireless digital scale not only shows body weight but also measure Body Fat, BMI and other data. Help you to track and manage your health easily.
One scale, unlimited users - bluetooth scale allows you and your family to share one scale. It's convenient for every member to know their body metrics better and do some relevant improvements.
4 high precision sensor - Made with high quality tempered glass platform, 4 sensitive electrodes, step-on technology, auto-calibration，max weight up to 396lbs/180kg. 3 x AAA batteries included.

Multifunctional app - FITINDEX APP allows you to set a goal and monitor your fitness trends with an automatic chart, to select data from specified periods for comparison, to export data in CSV for long-term storage, to manually enter data, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
